text:
The error text (e.g. "Objekt nicht gefunden" and its longer explanation) is 
presented in the language the client requests. However, in the footer, the date 
is shown in the language corresponding to the locale on the server side.

For example, if the language requested by the client is German, but httpd is 
running fr_FR locale, the page will be partially German, partially French.

Apache should make an attempt to print the date in the language requested by 
the client.
creator: egmont@gmail.com
jorton@redhat.com
text:
Marking as duplicate, same root-cause, different symptom.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 40432 ***
